# Step 1 -\> Cleaning the dataset

## Downloading and taking a look

```{r}
data <- read.csv("adult.csv", sep=',', na.strings = c("?"))
data
```

```{r}
summary(data)
str(data)
```

```{r}
freq_table <- as.data.frame(sort(table(data$workclass), decreasing = TRUE))
colnames(freq_table) <- c("workclass", "freq")
freq_table
```

```{r}
data$workclass[is.na(data$workclass)] <- "Private"
head(data)
str(data)
```

```{r}
freq_table_occ <- as.data.frame(sort(table(data$occupation), decreasing = TRUE))
colnames(freq_table_occ) <- c("occupation", "freq")
freq_table_occ
```

```{r}
data_occ_edd <- data %>%
  group_by(education, occupation) %>%
  summarise(freq = n()) %>%
  arrange(education)
data_occ_edd
```

```{r}
categories <- na.omit(unique(data$occupation))

idx_na <- which(is.na(data$occupation))

n_na <- length(idx_na)

replacement <- rep(categories, length.out = n_na)

set.seed(42)
replacement <- sample(replacement)

data$occupation[idx_na] <- replacement

head(data)
```

```{r}
freq_table_occ <- as.data.frame(sort(table(data$occupation), decreasing = TRUE))
colnames(freq_table_occ) <- c("occupation", "freq")
freq_table_occ
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
data_g <- data %>%

```
